english.segment1: to be out from under. to be yours again. tearing this asunder. talking now and then. to understand just what they see. this seeming meaningless story
english.segment2: remember me. through a mirror dimly. distance slowly deadens. only pieces of a looking glass remain
english.segment3: ashes are left, no more than dust. where they see beauty I see rust
english.segment4: say I will see you again
